description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，第一任中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会主任，中国人民解放军少将。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, the first Director of the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense, and a Major General of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国四川省东北部的一个县，是陈彬的出生地。
description.en: A county in the northeast of Sichuan Province, China, the birthplace of Chen Bin.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年间创建并领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces founded and led by the Communist Party of China between 1927 and 1937.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军时期的一所通讯技术学校，陈彬曾在此学习。
description.en: A communications technical school during the period of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, where Chen Bin studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，在长征后执行西渡黄河任务。
description.en: A contingent of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army that carried out the mission of crossing the Yellow River to the west after the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的先进青年的群众组织。
description.en: A mass organization of advanced youth led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期八路军的三个主力师之一。
description.en: One of the three main divisions of the Eighth Route Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在浙江省的军事领导指挥机关。
description.en: The military leadership and command organ of the People's Liberation Army in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部下属的部门，负责军队的组织编制、兵役、动员等工作。
description.en: A department under the General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army, responsible for the organization, conscription, and mobilization of the army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的将官军衔之一。
description.en: One of the general officer ranks of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的部门，负责国家经济计划。
description.en: A former department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national economic planning.

en: National Defense Science and Technology Commission

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国负责国防科学技术工作的领导机构。
description.en: Formerly the leading body responsible for national defense science and technology in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会
国防科学技术工业委员会
en: Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院下属的负责国防科技工业的部门。
description.en: Formerly a department under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for the science, technology, and industry for national defense.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会
en: 12th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1982年9月在北京召开的一次全国代表大会。
description.en: A national congress of the Communist Party of China held in Beijing in September 1982.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十二届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十二届中央委员会
en: 12th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会选举产生的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body elected by the 12th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十三次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十三次全国代表大会
en: 13th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1987年10月在北京召开的一次全国代表大会。
description.en: A national congress of the Communist Party of China held in Beijing in October 1987.

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间设立的中国共产党中央组织的过渡性机构。
description.en: A transitional body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that existed from 1982 to 1992.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程院院士，曾任国防科工委主任。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, former Director of the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 陈彬于1919年9月26日出生于四川通江。
description.en: Chen Bin was born in Tongjiang, Sichuan on September 26, 1919.

description.zh-cn: 陈彬于十六岁（约1935年）时参加中国工农红军。
description.en: Chen Bin joined the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army at the age of sixteen (around 1935).

description.zh-cn: 陈彬在参加红军后被选入军委通讯学校学习。
description.en: After joining the Red Army, Chen Bin was selected to study at the Military Commission Communications School.

description.zh-cn: 陈彬在长征后被编入西路军。
description.en: Chen Bin was incorporated into the West Route Army after the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 陈彬曾是中国共产主义青年团团员，后于1938年转为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Chen Bin was a member of the Communist Youth League of China before becoming a member of the Communist Party of China in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 陈彬于1938年由中国共产主义青年团团员转为中国共产党党员。
description.en: In 1938, Chen Bin transferred his membership from the Communist Youth League of China to the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争中，陈彬在八路军115师师部电台工作。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Chen Bin worked at the radio station of the 115th Division headquarters of the Eighth Route Army.

position.en: Chief of the Formation Section, Headquarters

description.zh-cn: 陈彬曾任华东军区第7兵团兼浙江军区司令部队列处长。
description.en: Chen Bin once served as the Chief of the Formation Section of the Headquarters of the 7th Army Corps of the East China Military Region and the Zhejiang Military District.

description.zh-cn: 陈彬曾被调往北京在军委总参军务部任职。
description.en: Chen Bin was transferred to Beijing to serve in the Military Affairs Department of the General Staff of the Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 陈彬于1961年晋升少将军衔。
description.en: Chen Bin was promoted to the rank of Major General in 1961.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈彬于1969年出任国家计划委员会副主任。
description.en: Chen Bin was appointed Deputy Director of the State Planning Commission in 1969.

description.zh-cn: 陈彬曾出任国防科学技术委员会副主任。
description.en: Chen Bin once served as the Deputy Director of the National Defense Science and Technology Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈彬于1982年至1985年担任新建立的国防科学技术工业委员会首任主任。
description.en: From 1982 to 1985, Chen Bin served as the first Director of the newly established Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 陈彬在1982年的中共十二大上被选为中共中央委员会委员。
description.en: Chen Bin was elected as a member of the Central Committee of the CCP at the 12th National Congress of the CCP in 1982.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十二届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈彬于1982年至1985年担任中共第十二届中央委员会委员。
description.en: Chen Bin served as a member of the 12th Central Committee of the CCP from 1982 to 1985.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十三次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 陈彬在1987年的中共十三大上被选为中央顾问委员会委员。
description.en: Chen Bin was elected as a member of the Central Advisory Commission at the 13th National Congress of the CCP in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 陈彬于1987年当选为中央顾问委员会委员。
description.en: Chen Bin was elected as a member of the Central Advisory Commission in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，丁衡高接替陈彬担任中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会主任。
description.en: In 1985, Ding Henggao succeeded Chen Bin as the Director of the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense of the People's Republic of China.
